snippet: With farmland in China scarce, migrants are crossing the border to lease large, unused tracts in the Far East, where many residents grumble about their presence and hard work....
abstract: Chinese farmers work tracts in Russia's Far East much larger than those available in China, either as hired laborers or tenants; arrangements under which Chinese farmers rent or work land draw ire of suspicious Russian nationalists and mixed reactions from locals, who nevertheless admire their work ethic.
lead_paragraph: With farmland in China scarce, migrants are crossing the border to lease large, unused tracts in the Far East, where many residents grumble about their presence and hard work.

headline.main: Russia’s Acres, if Not Its Locals, Beckon Chinese Farmers
headline.print_headline: Russia’s Acres, if Not Its Locals, Beckon Chinese
